item.title: Dictionary for BlackBerry
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I just got a dictionary for my Black Berry, I guess it’s from NetEase. Things work pretty smooth, though the dictionary coming with the software is not big enough, sometime it still needs to get online to get answers but as long as it can do that and get me the answer, I’m happy with [...]
item.content:encoded:
I just got a dictionary for my Black Berry, I guess it’s from NetEase.

Things work pretty smooth, though the dictionary coming with the software is not big enough, sometime it still needs to get online to get answers but as long as it can do that and get me the answer, I’m happy with it.
